node.text:
Romantic honeymoons where every detail is taken care of, Suite Indulgences where you can wake up to exquisite views at our club rooms & suites with private balconies. 
Staying with The Raviz Kovalam is sure to be an experience you will cherish both for its traditional grandeur as well as contemporary outlook.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
